name: root://
description:
Only for 3 players party. Player that created room must be operator (green box)! Other two must stay for red box (brute) and blue box (scout). 

An assymetric co-operative game inspired by the spirit of hacking. You will have to get into the root directory of a compromised system, unraveling mysteries of its owner. Made at GGJ 2023 with coherence.

Original soundtrack by freadhead (main theme).
